import java.util.Scanner;


 class Mangalyaan {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
            Scanner s=new Scanner(System.in);
            int test=s.nextInt();
            while(test>0)
            {
            	int N=s.nextInt();
            	int P=s.nextInt();
            	int count=0;
            	for(int i=1;i<=N;i++)
            	{
            		int ele=s.nextInt();
            		if(ele>=P)
            		{
            			count++;
            		}
            	}
            	System.out.println(count);
            	test--;
            }
	}

}
